name: EXIT (itch) (YUHANG CHE)
description:
EXIT

Exit is a puzzle game where you are locked in a room and you need to try to escape from that room, you need to click to find hidden props, and when you collect the right things, you can find out how to escape.

Control
  • Click on the mobile
  • Click on the object
Credits
  • BGM
  • From: http://www.yisell.com/
